code: export var REQUEST="FORGOT_PASS_REQUEST";export var SUCCESS="FORGOT_PASS_SUCCESS";export var FAILURE="FORGOT_PASS_FAILURE";export var CLEAR_USERNAME="CLEAR_USERNAME";var clearUsername=function clearUsername(){return{type:CLEAR_USERNAME};};var forgotPassword=function forgotPassword(url,data){return{types:[REQUEST,SUCCESS,FAILURE],payload:{client:"default",request:{url:url,method:"put",data:data}}};};export default{forgotPassword:forgotPassword,clearUsername:clearUsername};
